description.value:
Bearing Heraldry or Ornamental designs, usually worn below the waist but occasionally as full tabards. Can be Ornamental (+2 to Fellowship Tests), Deathwatch/Squad Heraldry (+1 Cohesion per achieved Primary Objective), or Chapter Heraldry (+1 Effective Rank when determining Solo Ability Effectiveness and -1 Squad Cohesion).

Requirements

Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping. Chapter: Black Templars

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
